console-browserify change log

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

This project adheres to Semantic Versioning.

1.2.0

  • Move to the browserify org.
  • Remove date-now dependency. ([@jakepusateri](https://github.com/jakepusateri) in #10)
  • Fix memory leak in time/timeEnd. ([@maxnordlund](https://github.com/maxnordlund) in #11)
